DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate success inferior alveolar nerve block ( IANB ) mandibular molar irreversible pulpitis woman treatment selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRIs ) .
DOC.brief_title: Success Inferior Alveolar Nerve Block Women Taking Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors
DOC.detailed_description: Seventy patient diagnosis symptomatic irreversible pulpitis one mandibular molar assign either SSRI user SSRI non-users group . SSRIs user 35 woman take SSRIs refer endodontic treatment psychiatric clinic clinic endodontic department Isfahan University Medical Sciences . SSRIs non-users also 35 woman take SSRIs refer endodontic treatment dental clinic . The protocol study approve Ethics Committee university ( . 394867 ) . Written inform consent obtain patient . The level anxiety patient determine use Corah Dental Anxiety Scale . The patient register baseline pain severity use Heft-Parker visual analogue scale ( HP-VAS ) . Two standard IANBs ( 1.8-mL cartridge ) 2 % lidocaine 1:100,000 epinephrine ( Darupakhsh , Tehran , Iran ) administer patient . Fifteen minute injection , teeth isolated rubber dam , access cavity preparation initiate . The operator instruct patient rate pain experience preparation access cavity placement initial file . If patient felt pain , treatment immediately suspend , patient record pain intensity use HP-VAS . No mild pain ( HP-VAS score â‰¤ 54 ) define success .
